django.contrib.gis.gdal.geomtype
================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.geomtype


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.geomtype.OGRGeomType


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: OGRGeomType(type_input)

   Encapsulate OGR Geometry Types.


   .. py:attribute:: wkb25bit
      :value: -2147483648



   .. py:attribute:: num


   .. py:property:: name

      Return a short-hand string form of the OGR Geometry type.


   .. py:property:: django

      Return the Django GeometryField for this OGR Type.


   .. py:method:: to_multi()

      Transform Point, LineString, Polygon, and their 25D equivalents
      to their Multi... counterpart.
